website_summaries.verdict: Good for detangling long, thick hair.
pros: Intended for smoothing, polishing, and anti-frizz detangling
Adds shine to dull, lifeless hair
Natural ionic bristles emit negative ions into the hair for deep hydration and conditioning effects
Natural ionic pads facilitate faster blow-drying and styling
Natural bamboo wood is lightweight and ecologically friendly
Brush works especially well when combined with agave oil
cons: One customer reported melting brush with a hairdryer

customer_reviews.title: Not big deal
customer_reviews.text: This just an expensive hair brush ... The little topper come off this brush just like any other onesie .... I very disappointed about that I hairbrush....
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Plotner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is exactly what I wanted. It’s better in person than the picture suggests. It’s very sturdy and looks like it will last a long time. It really gives my hair more shine. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: NVLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairbrush as a present for my girlfriend. Everything is great...except, the paint is peeling off. I wish the quality is better.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brush.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. It is strong but easy on hair. One can feel and see the difference in ones hair the first time. Leaves hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The brush goes really well through my extremely think and ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush goes really well through my extremely think and very long hair. At first try my hair became very staticky but I am hoping with a little oil that will be taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: NaeNae

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this brush. Makes combing out my 4c hair a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair smooth and shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! Makes my hair smoother and shinier every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: BeagleLove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I definitely had to come back and edit my review. Although I really like this brush, my handle somehow split down in equal parts. I had to tape it and now my hair get caught in it so, I’m getting rid of it 😢. No idea how that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Soft shiny hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush makes my hair feel soft after each brush. Detangles hair without snags.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrika I. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It is beautifully made & gentle to your hair & scalp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: The brush bristles are long enough and thin enough to get through my think curly hair and to my scalp. The brush has a good weight and feel in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Tanner

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this brush!
customer_reviews.text: She swears it makes her hair softer. I can see the difference and feel it too. So no complaints on this end. Very pleased with all aspects of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed with this hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this hairbrush. I usually brush my hair as I'm blow drying it, and nowhere did I see it mentioned that the brush shouldn't be used with a hairdryer. The first time I used it with my dryer though the bristles bent and warped, making the brush pretty much useless. I've never had a hairbrush do this after years of use with a hairdryer, let alone once.
customer_reviews.author: Jespree

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This brush is pretty nice, but as other reviewers have said, this brush isn't very good quality. After a week or so of using it, 3 of the bristles have come off. Can't wait for the handle to break!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Retterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush! The reason for the 4 stars is for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush!!! Brushes so well! And it really helps avoid breakage!
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: but not as good as other users were claiming
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough, but not as good as other users were claiming.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it! Best brush she's ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: John Melfi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. It keeps my hair from getting frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla victoria ashby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My kids hated this brush. Didn't work well with knots.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Would give negative stars if possible. Arrived complete with it's own strand of hair. GROSS!!! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: bvanwi

customer_reviews.title: borrowed and loved this brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush about four months ago. Well, my daughter came for a visit, borrowed and loved this brush, so I gave it to her. I thought I would just replace it with a "Walmart" brush, no big deal. Well, apparently I loved it as well, because no other brush compared. So, I just purchased me a replacement brush and won't be giving it to nobody. It's a pricey brush, but worth it IMO!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, its the perfect size and I like that it doesnt make that annoying squeak sound my goody brushes always did. Never going back!
customer_reviews.author: danielle doucette

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush! It lasts a while so is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip and love the look. However, I have not noticed any real difference on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

product_meta.title: Agave HEALING OIL Smooth & Shine Natural Bamboo Paddle Brush, 4.2 Oz
product_meta.description:
Designed to condition hair, adding shine, smoothness and silkiness. Their boar bristles are infused with NanoIonic Mineral for added antistatic benefits, and their NanoIonic pads and barrels allow for faster blow-drying and styling.

BRAND STORY
Agave Healing Oil Haircare is specially formulated to provide the ultimate hair transformation and restoration.
